${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:Crysknife.NAME: Crysknife
${modID}:Crysknife.DESCRIPTION: Slice with your crysknife for !D! damage.

${modID}:Defend.NAME: Defend
${modID}:Defend.DESCRIPTION: Your personal shield powers up to add !B! block.

${modID}:AtreidesPower.NAME: Atreides Loyalty
${modID}:AtreidesPower.DESCRIPTION: House Atreides trust you eternally. Gain 1 *Loyalty.

${modID}:BenePower.NAME: Tleilaxu Tanks
${modID}:BenePower.DESCRIPTION: You gain access to the Tleilaxu Tanks. Gain 1 *Revive.

${modID}:EmpPower.NAME: Emperor's Wealth
${modID}:EmpPower.DESCRIPTION: The Emperor bankrolls your campaign. Gain 30% additional gold.

${modID}:HarkPower.NAME: Harkonnen Might
${modID}:HarkPower.DESCRIPTION: You gain a permanent 2 Strength from the Harkonnen miltary complex.
